juisynth.logic.envelope

Class ADSR

  • java.lang.Object
    • juisynth.logic.envelope.EnvelopeGenerator
      • juisynth.logic.envelope.ADSR

  • public class ADSR
extends EnvelopeGenerator
    ADSR is an implementation of EnvelopeGenerator, providing an attack, decay, sustain and release phases.
    Author:
    juicyp
